<a id="VisualShaderNodeInput"></a>

# VisualShaderNodeInput

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNode](VisualShaderNode.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Represents the input shader parameter within the visual shader graph.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Gives access to input variables (built-ins) available for the shader. See the shading reference for the list of available built-ins for each shader type (check ``Tutorials`` section for link).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Shading reference index](../tutorials/shaders/shader_reference/index.md)

## Signals

<a id="VisualShaderNodeInput_signal_input_type_changed"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**input_type_changed**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#VisualShaderNodeInput_signal_input_type_changed)

Emitted when input is changed via [input_name](VisualShaderNodeInput.md#VisualShaderNodeInput_property_input_name).

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="VisualShaderNodeInput_property_input_name"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[String](String.md) **input_name** = `"[None]"` [ðŸ”—](#VisualShaderNodeInput_property_input_name)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_input_name**\ (\ value\: [String](String.md)\ )
- [String](String.md) **get_input_name**\ (\ )

One of the several input constants in lower-case style like: "vertex" (``VERTEX``) or "point_size" (``POINT_SIZE``).

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="VisualShaderNodeInput_method_get_input_real_name"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[String](String.md) **get_input_real_name**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#VisualShaderNodeInput_method_get_input_real_name)

Returns a translated name of the current constant in the Redot Shader Language. E.g. ``"ALBEDO"`` if the [input_name](VisualShaderNodeInput.md#VisualShaderNodeInput_property_input_name) equal to ``"albedo"``.
